duties_responsibilities.duty: Process hourly and non-exempt salary payroll weekly.
Enter and post time in multiple systems (SAP, UKG, Pacific Time Reporting System)
Various reporting duties (payroll preview, end of month)
Preparing invoices for processing by corporate accounting.
Working with corporate accounting function to resolve invoice discrepancies.
Collecting manual authorizations from management for invoices.
Reviewing/Verifying Purchase Orders (verifying quantity, vendor, pricing).

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree in Business or Accounting plus 2 years of experience OR 5 years of professional experience in accounting.
